product.name: CHICOLOGY Bamboo Blinds , Shades Roman for Windows Window Home Patio & Shade 27"W X 64"H, Squirrel
product.description:
Bring the beauty of nature indoors with their earthy tones and organic textures. These shades offer a balance between light and privacy, allowing for a cozy, sun-kissed ambiance while maintaining a tranquil retreat when needed. Elevate your space with these eco-conscious window treatments and embrace the beauty of a truly organic interior
These shades are crafted from real and natural bamboo. Color variations may differ slightly from the display as every shade is unique.
Easily raise or lower the shades by gently lifting or pulling down on the bottom rail to the desired height.
Attached hanging valance hides the cordless mechanism and provides a seamless look. No deductions are made; this shade is true-to-size.
These woven wood shades are able to match rustic, tropical, farmhouse, and bohemian home styles to name a few.
Are these shades machine washable?
No, we only recommend light spot cleaning with a damp cloth.
How do I operate these shades?
Simply push them up or pull them down with the bottom rail.
Can these be cut to a shorter length?
No, this would sever the internal tension mechanism and the shades would no longer function.
Do these shades shades block out all light?
No, these shades are designed to filter and diffuse light, creating a soft, inviting ambiance.
Do these shades provide privacy?
While they allow filtered light to pass through, these shades do offer moderate privacy. However, for complete privacy, consider layering with curtains.
We believe window blinds and shades are more than just functional necessities. Every window tells a story, and our products are part of that narrative.
With a focus on affordability, innovation, and ease of installation, we have revolutionized window treatments to suit the modern lifestyle.
Effortlessly make your home a place as chic as you are.
